鷮字的基本解释

鷮
jiāo
野鸡的一种，尾长，可作装饰品，边走边叫，性勇健，善斗：“若夫游鷮高翬，绝阬踰斥。”

鷮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》舉喬切，平宵，見。］
［《廣韻》巨嬌切，平宵，羣。］
雉的一种。尾长，走且鸣，性勇健，肉鲜美，羽可为饰。

鷮字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷮； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1501第01
【廣韻】舉喬切【集韻】居妖切【韻會】居祅切【正韻】堅堯切，?音驕。【說文】走鳴長尾鷄也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鷮雉。【郭註】卽鷮鷄也。【詩·小雅】有集維鷮。【山海經】女几之山，其鳥多白鷮。【陸璣疏】鷮微小於翟，走而且鳴，曰鷮鷮。其尾長，肉甚美。【埤雅】薛綜曰：雉之健者爲鷮，尾長六尺。【字說】鳴則首尾喬如。【後漢·華佗傳】冷壽光嘗屈頸鷮息。又【唐韻】巨嬌切【集韻】渠嬌切，?音喬。義同。

鷮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷮字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
jiāo
A kind of pheasant with a long tail. It can be used as an ornament. It screams while walking. It is brave and strong in nature. It is good at fighting.
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guangyun" cite Qiaoqie, Ping Xiao, see you. ]
["Guang Yun" Ju Jiao cut, flat night, group. ]
A kind of pheasant. The tail is long, walks and sings, with strong sex, delicious meat, and feathers as ornaments.
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷮; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1501 No. 01
[Guang Yun] Ju Qiao Qi [Ji Yun] Ju Yao Qi [Yun Hui] Ju Zuo Qi [Zheng Yun] Strong Yao Qi, sound arrogant. [Said the text] The long-tailed chicken is also walking. 【Erya·Shiniao】The pheasant. [Guo's Note] 卽鷮鸡 also. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】There is Ji Weiluo. 【Shanhaijing】Nvji's mountain has many white owls. 【Lu Jishu】The scorpion is smaller than Zhai, walks and sings, and says the scorpion. Its tail is long and its flesh is very beautiful. [Piya] Xue Zong said: The strongest pheasant is the pheasant, with a tail of six feet long. 【Words】Ming is Qiao Ru at the beginning and the end. [Later Han·Hua Tuo Biography] Leng Shouguang tastes flexion of the neck. [Tang Yun] Ju Jiao cut [Ji Yun] Qu Jiao cut,? Yin Qiao. The same meaning.
